resources.string: Transfer Money for free to family and friends.
Fund your account using mobile money.
Withdraw your funds to your mobile money.
Join a community of thousands of economic\nagents today !
\"Your beliefs don\'t make you a better person.\nYour behavior does.\"

\"If the plan doesn\'t work change the plan but,\nnever the goal.\"
